name: Do You Fight The Bear?
description:
You just want to work productively at Transmissions Inc., but this bear keeps interrupting! Do you leave this aggression unpunished?

Game comprised of a few minigames, followed up by a very difficult decision.

Context

Created in 2 days for Global Game Jam 2018

Team (Bearly Legible)

  • Art
    • Alice Wong
    • Chelsea Lecompte | @0ffbeatt
    • Nianna Zheng | @FadelessRed
  • Code
    • Daniel Praymayer | @devtimezombie
    • Daniel Saulnier | @Daniel_Saulnier
  • Sound
    • Daniel Saulnier (Voice in theme music)
    • Ossy Meza | @oss_ssy
    • Ryan Maxwell | Website

Controls:

  • Right Mouse Button - pick up
  • Right Mouse Button (held) + Left Mouse Button - interact
